title: Some aliens (illegal?) are driving around with \international\" drivers licenses. I know of one in particular who has lived here for many years and still does not have a NC driver license OR a green card. How is that possible?"
text:
North Carolina does not recognize international drivers licenses,
according to the N.C. Highway Patrol:
http://www.nccrimecontrol.org/index2.cfm?a=000003,000014,000766,000774
